T√≠tulo: Falta de comprometimento e Insatisfa√ß√£o / Lack of Commitment and Dissatisfaction
Conte√∫do: Estive no hotel Grand Mercure Copacabana no dia 18/12 at√© o dia 19/12/2019, na ocasi√£o eu solicitei o servi√ßo de quarto e ao informar a atendente que precisava da nota fiscal, a mesma me informou que n√£o seria poss√≠vel o envio naquela noite devido a falta de sistema no momento, mas que no meu check out a mesma estaria dispon√≠vel, no dia seguinte eu realizei o check out e a nota n√£o estava dispon√≠vel, o recepcionista contatou algu√©m e me informou que a nota estaria dispon√≠vel at√© o final do dia no meu e-mail cadastrado, e mesmo n√£o tendo uma boa experi√™ncia de atendimento pela primeira vez que me hospedei no hotel, eu acreditei que a mesma estaria dispon√≠vel conforme informado e prometido.  Enfim, j√° faz quase 1 m√™s e ap√≥s 3 exaustivas liga√ß√µes e envio de e-mails pelo site do Grand Mercure, n√£o consegui a nota fiscal e n√£o tive qualquer retorno sobre o assunto, eu quero e exijo o recibo referente ao servi√ßo prestado naquela noite e ressalto que nunca tive uma experi√™ncia t√£o desagrad√°vel e tive que desprender de tanto tempo e desgaste para conseguir apenas uma nota fiscal de um servi√ßo que voc√™s prestaram, a falta de processo e falta comprometimento que esse hotel possui √© inaceit√°vel, principalmente pelo p√©ssimo atendimento dos funcion√°rios que possuem, por fim eu espero que resolvam esse simples problema que parece imenso para o hotel Grand Mercure, eu n√£o aceitaria ficar nesse hotel novamente nem que me oferecessem di√°rias gratuitas, pois detesto ter que desprender meu tempo com assuntos desnecess√°rios e √© exatamente isso que estou fazendo apenas para cobrar um simples recibo.  Gostaria de ressaltar tamb√©m que instruam os seus funcion√°rios a tratarem melhor os hospedes e que passem informa√ß√µes b√°sicas que at√© o hotel de 1 estrela informa, como wi-fi, se tem ou n√£o academia, restaurante, onde ser√° servido o caf√© e etc, pois eu simplesmente fiz o meu check in e tive que perguntar sobre essas informa√ß√µes, na verdade o funcion√°rio n√£o se teve nem ao trabalho de complementar a minha primeira pergunta eu tive que fazer v√°rias para ter todas as informa√ß√µes B√ÅSICAS.  Por fim, n√£o indico esse hotel para qualquer pessoa, pois acredito que o pre√ßo e estrelas que o hotel possuem n√£o est√£o de acordo com os servi√ßos prestados.    I was at the Grand Mercure Copacabana hotel on 18/12 until 19/12/2019, at the time I requested room service and informing the attendant that I needed the invoice, she informed me that it would not be possible to send that night due to lack of system at the moment, but at my check out it would be available, the next day I checked out and the note was not available, the receptionist contacted someone and informed me that the note would be available by the end of the day in my registered email, and even though I didn't have a good customer service experience for the first time I stayed at the hotel, I believed it would be available as informed and promised.  Anyway, it's been almost 1 month and after 3 exhaustive phone calls and emailing through the Grand Mercure website, I couldn't get the invoice and had no return on it, I want and demand the receipt for the service that night And I point out that I have never had such an unpleasant experience and had to let go of so much time and stress to get just an invoice for a service you provided, the lack of process and lack of commitment that this hotel has is unacceptable, especially for the poor service of Finally, I hope you will solve this simple problem that seems immense for the Grand Mercure hotel, I would not accept to stay at this hotel again or offer me free nights, because I hate to have to waste my time on unnecessary matters and that's exactly I'm doing just to collect a simple receipt.  I would also like to point out that they instruct their staff to treat their guests better and to pass on basic information that even the 1 star hotel informs, such as wi-fi, whether or not it has a gym, restaurant, where coffee will be served and so on. I simply checked in and had to ask about this information, in fact the employee didn't even bother to supplement my first question I had to do several to get all the BASIC information.  Finally, I do not recommend this hotel to anyone, as I believe the price and stars the hotel has are not in accordance with the services provided.
